extendedInfo.description: Do you have to study a dictionary for an exam? Would you like to create a quiz for you and your friends just for fun or to support your studying? Then this application is worth trying!Ask It From Me is the ultimate dictionary and quiz studying tool! Write down your own dictionary or quiz to a text file and let this application ask the words/questions in it from you. It pics words/questions from the selected dictionary/quiz in randomized order and gives possible translations/answers for them. All you have to do is pick the correct one! Moreover, AIFM brings extra tools like hiding the options and personal settings to further enhance your studying.Features:- Unlimited amount of dictionaries and quiz, words and questions, and data files supported.- Great flexibility.- Optimized word and question picking.- Tools to further enhance your learning.- Support for UTF-8 encoded text files.- Switch primary and secondary languages.- Exam mode.- Personal settings.- Great help files and a setup guide.Please note that everybody learn in their own way and I don't guarantee that this application will help you.This app has been previously known as Study the Dictionary (StD).
